MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the SY17 postcode area of Caersws. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 12:40am. Our engineers have arrived at the School substation and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:19am on 20th December
